comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: The Bridge opened 19 March 1932. As the tram is operating and there is a car in the distance (yes that was the density of traffic at most times after the bridge opened), I'd say the photograph date may be incorrect.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Maybe this was during load testing (!) www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/5938124129/in/pho... ...yes I'd say the pic was taken some time after the bridge was opened. Evidently the asphalt surface initially laid on the roadway wasn't a great success and it quickly began to crack and wear...and I'd say we see a good few months of wear here. I wonder what the toll was for an elephant? www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/3656577184/in/pho... - here they are in full flight
